commit message:

-switch default back to regular reply (not quick reply)
-update quick reply to have always visible send button
-update text counter on quick reply (as per system messaging app)
-remove on phone sms notification

-apply patch to TestNotificationDialogPreference to prevent test notify playing on rotate (thanks macarse)
-update quick reply layout (removed built-in dialog buttons so voice transcription button can be at the bottom and send button can be next to edittext)
-update quick reply dialog create to match new layout
